name: GitBucket - Style Github as BitBucket
description:
GitBucket v1.0.8

Stuck on Github but you love the new BitBucket design? We've got ya covered

This theme makes GitHub look like BitBucket If you find any issues, please tell me them here: https://github.com/wesley-devmuis/gitbucket/issues
additional_info:
Release v1.0.8:
Fix colours and sections

Release v1.0.7:
Fixed for large displays

Release v1.0.6:
Fixed issue #7

Release v1.0.5:
Fixed issues #2 and #5

Release v1.0.4:
Fixed issue #3

Release v1.0.3:
Fixed a view other font color issues with links

Release v1.0.1:
Fixed font color on project -> search -> issues page

Release 1.0:
No bugs detected as of yet
